featured.text: In 2011, a minister, Ryu Matsumoto, was forced to resign after only a week in office, when a bad-tempered encounter with local officials was televised.

definition.zh_def: 將影像或聲音透過電視傳送或播放。
definition.en_def: To broadcast (a program or event) on television.
definition.example: They plan to televise the concert live from the stadium.
